title: Email Verification

instruction.long: Please enter the email address where you want to receive the verification code. This email will be used to verify your account and cannot be changed later.

success: Check your email for the verification link!

alert.error: Failed to send verification email. Please try again.
alert.alreadyRegistered: This email is already registered. Please use a different email.
alert.alreadyRequested: A verification email has already been requested. Please try again later.
